column4: What are you talking about? I'm trying to get my bcm4311 working
I can get that card to work :)  Are you on 11.04 ?
sudo apt-get install firmware-b43-installer and sudo apt-get install b43-fwcutter
your wifi card is now working
Now, how do I get this to start automatically?
It didn't on this boot, let me get this figured out.
or really?  pastebin the output of sudo lspci -k
gotta remove that.  Do you know how?
The STA driver was still installed. yep
